title: A full stack website: Daniel's Lab
description:
A modern, full-stack portfolio site featuring a custom-built blogging system with full-text search and authentication from scratch.
- **Modular backend**: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Zod, Meilisearch
- **Reactive frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion

title: Book Me: a meeting room booking calendar
description:
A modern, intuitive **room booking system** built with React
- Designed with a **scrollable calendar UI** that adapts between desktop (week view) and mobile (multi-day view)
- Introduces a custom **gridless layout system** with pointer-based interaction and absolute booking rendering
- Handles **access control** and **conflict prevention** through role-based validation and slot-level rules

title: Interactive Particle Field
description:
A simple particle toy built with **Three.js** and **React Three Fiber**, inspired by my earlier ray tracing project **mini-rt** at Hive Helsinki.
- Uses **instanced meshes** to efficiently render 2000+ rotating particles
- Global rotation responds to mouse position via `useFrame`
- Modularly designed for future expansion into a fullscreen reactive visual layer
